footer.intro: Investing in land is investing in the future. With our book and services, we give you the keys to build a solid, protected and compliant asset base. Your land security starts here.
footer.newsletterTitle: Join our newsletter to never miss an update!

trainings.videoUnsupported: Your browser does not support video playback.
trainings.heroSubtitle: Train yourself to secure your land projects. Our specialized trainings provide practical and legal knowledge essential to understand the land and real estate sector. Develop the right reflexes, master key documents, and avoid pitfalls with accessible, immediately applicable knowledge.
trainings.statDescription: The land and real estate sector in Ivory Coast is complex. Our trainings, designed by experts, cover acquisition, verification of documents (ACD, ADU, land records, certificates, etc.), dispute management, and fraud prevention. Interactive and adapted to each audience, they provide a clear, operational vision to make safe decisions.
trainings.reasonsTitle: Three (3) big reasons everyone joins our training
trainings.noVideo: No video available for this training.

author.heroSubtitle: Writer and Specialist in Land and Real Estate Law!
author.isAuthorOf: He is the author of the book Buy land safely in Ivory Coast
author.bookDescription: ‚ÄúBuy land safely in Ivory Coast‚Äù is a reference work highlighting land issues, essential acquisition rules, dispute resolution mechanisms, and pitfalls to avoid. Structured in 7 chapters and 155 pages, it clearly presents key documents such as ADU, land records, ACD, CMPF, and more.
author.contactParagraph: Do you have a question about the book? Want to know more about our trainings or organize a conference? Write to us and let‚Äôs move together towards a Ivory Coast better protected against land fraud.
